meanings.definition: A person or company that repackages goods for resale.
meanings.sent1: The repackagers carefully put the items in new packaging.
meanings.sent2: The repackagers at the store changed the packaging of the products.
meanings.sent3: The repackagers decided to wrap the items in colorful paper for fun.
meanings.sent4: The repackagers were like artists, transforming the goods into new packages.
meanings.sent5: The repackagers made the products look brand new with their packaging skills.

meanings.definition: The act of repackaging goods for resale.
meanings.sent1: The repackagers completed the task of repackaging the items efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The repackagers were responsible for the repackaging process.
meanings.sent3: The repackagers turned the boring task of repackaging into a game.
meanings.sent4: The repackagers performed their magic, turning old packaging into new.
meanings.sent5: The repackagers excelled in the art of repackaging, making the products look appealing.
